analyzed: @200a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: he badzra kra ma ku ru kulle s'a dha nam /
analyzed: he badzra kra ma ku ru kulle s'a dha nam /
translated: Hevajrakramakurukullesādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: kye rdo rje'i rim pa'i rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: kye rdo rje'i rim pa'i rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: Kye rdo rje’i rim pa’i rigs byed ma’i sgrub thabs

original: ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Kurukullā.

original: dang po rang gi snying gar kha dog dmar po'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la /
analyzed: dang po rang gi snying gar kha dog dmar po'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la /
translated: First, one should visualize a red moon maṇḍala in one’s heart.

original: de la hr'i:yig dmar po blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la hr'i:yig dmar po blta bar bya'o //
translated: On that, one should see a red letter hrīḥ.

original: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: Then, one should confess one’s sins and so forth.

original: phyi nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Afterwards, one should meditate on emptiness.

original: 'dir rnal 'byor pas stong pa nyid la gnas nas ram yig las mdun du nyi ma rnam par bsgoms la ;
analyzed: 'dir rnal 'byor pas stong pa nyid la gnas nas ram yig las mdun du nyi ma rnam par bsgoms la ;
translated: Here, the yogī, abiding in emptiness, should visualize a sun in front, from the letter raṃ.

original: de'i steng du h'um yig kha dog nag po 'od zer dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um yig kha dog nag po 'od zer dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: On that, one should visualize a black letter hūṃ, endowed with light rays.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
translated: That completely transforms into a vajra cross.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhi dang / rdo rje'i rab dang / rdo rje'i gur bcings nas aom raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhi dang / rdo rje'i rab dang / rdo rje'i gur bcings nas aom raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: That completely transforms into a ground that is the nature of a vajra, a vajra fence, and a vajra pavilion.

original: phyi nas @200b rnal 'byor pas padma dmar po'o //
analyzed: phyi nas @200b rnal 'byor pas padma dmar po'o //
translated: Then, the yogī should visualize a red lotus.

original: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: On top of that is a moon disc.

original: de'i steng du hr'i:yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las autpa la dmar po'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du hr'i:yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las autpa la dmar po'o //
translated: On top of that is a red hrīḥ syllable, which completely transforms into a red utpala.

original: de'i steng du slar yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i steng du slar yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: On top of that is again a moon disc.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las ku ru kuller bdag nyid bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las ku ru kuller bdag nyid bsam par bya ste /
translated: That completely transforms into Kurukullā, whom one should visualize as follows:

original: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa gzhon zhing rked pa la stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa /
analyzed: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa gzhon zhing rked pa la stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa /
translated: She stands in the pose of half-dance, youthful, with a tiger-skin skirt wrapped around her waist.

original: phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with the five symbolic bone ornaments.

original: skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa mgon po 'od dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan pa /
analyzed: skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa mgon po 'od dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan pa /
translated: Her orange hair swirls upward, and she is crowned with Lord Amitābha.

original: phyag na mda' gzhu dang de bzhin du autpa la bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag na mda' gzhu dang de bzhin du autpa la bsnams pa'o //
translated: She holds a bow and arrow in her hands, and likewise an utpala.

original: 'dir gnas nges pa med cing zas kyang nges pa med la /
analyzed: 'dir gnas nges pa med cing zas kyang nges pa med la /
translated: Here there is no fixed place, nor is there a fixed diet.

original: 'dir sngags bzlas shing bya ba dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: 'dir sngags bzlas shing bya ba dang ldan pas so //
translated: Here one should recite the mantra and perform the rite.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du 'ga' zhig gis kyang mi shes te de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du 'ga' zhig gis kyang mi shes te de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: No one will know, just as it is, and thus one should practice.

original: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ kuru ku llē hṛīḥ svāhā.

original: zla ba phyed du khri phrag gcig gis rgyal bo dang / skye dgu'i 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba phyed du khri phrag gcig gis rgyal bo dang / skye dgu'i 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: For half a month, with ten thousand [recitations], one will enthrall a king and the world of beings.

original: bye bas dud 'gro dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa dang / 'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: bye bas dud 'gro dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa dang / 'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin rnams kyang ngo //
translated: With one hundred thousand [recitations], one will enthrall animals, yakṣas, and so forth, and with seven hundred thousand [recitations], even the asuras.

original: kye'i rdo rje'i rim pa'i ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: kye'i rdo rje'i rim pa'i ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Kurukullā according to the Hevajra tradition is complete.
